name: Horrible Husky
description: Use M.U.S.H (Mind Ur Siberian Husky) V1.0 to keep your husky happy remotely and stop him / her from destroying your house whilst you are not home. The less bored your husky is, the less likely he’ll trash your home whilst you’re away. The longer you leave him the more agitated he’ll become and the quicker he’ll damage your home!
